mapper.select: SELECT SCORE_INFO_SEQ, TITLE, PARTICIPATION_YN, REG_DT FROM TB_SCORE_INFO ORDER BY REG_DT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_SCORE(SCORE_INFO_SEQ, `RANK`, SCORE, REG_DT) VALUES (#{scoreInfoSeq},#{rank},#{score},now())
